title: Rek'Sai's Champ/Skin Bundle Cost
body: Can anyone tell me how much the Rek'Sai champ/skin bundle will be? Will it be more expensive since the skin is more expensive? Pls answer asap, thanks.

replies.body:
> Can anyone tell me how much the Rek'Sai champ/skin bundle will be? Will it be more expensive since the skin is more expensive? Pls answer asap, thanks.

I would like to say it would be 1950 RP or around 20$ it being more costly.
his skin is awesome, anyone know when he comes out with the bundle,? i heard it will be on Sunday but idk

> his skin is awesome, anyone know when he comes out with the bundle,? i heard it will be on Sunday but idk

If u heard it was sunday, it was probably a rumor because i dont believe anyone knows except for riot themselves. I do agree with u tho. his skin is awesome :D (hopefully it's tonight or tommorow. The sooner the better!)
Battlecast Vel'Koz cost 1350 RP as well and his bundle was the usual 1462 RP so I'm positive it will be the same for Rek'Sai!
